quote: I'm not saying dating is sinful, and I'm not saying a guy and a girl should never spend time alone together. I'm saying let's wait until we can be purposeful, so there's a reason behind our relationship, and we're not just stirring up passion for the sake of a good time.
author: Joshua Harris

quote: My husband's a little younger than me. When I first started dating him, I just fell mad for him. I made a deal with myself: I was like, 'I'm not gonna get weird about what the future might be. I'm just going to be in every moment I can and enjoy us to the fullest.' I told him that, too.
author: Joelle Carter

quote: If you're a good Amish girl, you're courting, you have three or four different beaus, and you go out and stay out all night. That's just their tradition. They date under the covering of night. No one knows who they're dating or seeing until two weeks before they're going to be married. It's how they've done it for 300 years.
author: Beverly Lewis

quote: I date older men, and I date younger men. I have no rules about that.
author: Mary Frann

quote: I'm a bad dater - I'm just not good at it. It's so weird dating in this town. It's like high school. I get a lot of people who have their publicist call my agent to ask, 'Is she dating anyone?'
author: Jules Asner

quote: Love was not in it for me at first. I dated guys because of the way they looked. And then I began to learn that it's what's inside that counts. Love to me now is understanding. It's giving.
author: Crystal Waters

quote: I hated the idea of a high school sweetheart. Growing up, oh my God, it just made me sick. I wanted to have a range of cool boyfriends. I wanted to travel around and date these interesting men. Then it just happened. You fall in love.
author: Charlotte Arnold

quote: People with film careers get a whole onslaught of people they spend 12 hours a day with every three months. It's like speed dating. You've got a fast-track to social intimacy with a whole bunch of people.
author: Christine Elise

quote: What online dating did was offer me the opportunity to go out with a bunch of different people from different industries I really didn't want to limit myself with people who are in the entertainment industry.
author: Essence Atkins

quote: Facebook and pictures on the Internet have created such a different way of dating. It's not necessarily good because an obsessive quality can develop in people.
author: Alexander Koch

quote: I'm a bit of a romantic, to a fault. It's led me to some great things and also some sad things. It's made me a better person, to keep a good spirit about dating.
author: Alexander Koch

quote: When I was five years old, I told my parents that I wanted to take ballet. So, ballet was the focus of my life... until puberty. Then I discovered boys and started dating a guy with a mohawk who'd come to my ballet class and freak everybody out. Shortly after that is when I quit.
author: Chandra West

quote: When you're young and dating someone, just play it safe and don't try so hard.
author: Matt Prokop

quote: The most beautiful things are not associated with money; they are memories and moments. If you don't celebrate those, they can pass you by.
author: Alek Wek

quote: Rule No.1: Never lose money. Rule No.2: Never forget rule No.1.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: To give real service you must add something which cannot be bought or measured with money, and that is sincerity and integrity.
author: Douglas Adams

quote: Money won't create success, the freedom to make it will.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: Money is not the only answer, but it makes a difference.
author: Barack Obama

quote: Money can't buy life.
author: Bob Marley

quote: A wise man should have money in his head, but not in his heart.
author: Jonathan Swift

quote: To get rich, you have to be making money while you're asleep.
author: David Bailey

quote: Money and corruption are ruining the land, crooked politicians betray the working man, pocketing the profits and treating us like sheep, and we're tired of hearing promises that we know they'll never keep.
author: Ray Davies

quote: The hardest thing to understand in the world is the income tax.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Never spend your money before you have earned it.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: Money and success don't change people they merely amplify what is already there.
author: Will Smith

quote: A rich man is nothing but a poor man with money.
author: W. C. Fields

quote: There are three faithful friends - an old wife, an old dog, and ready money.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Obesity in children is growing out of control. A big part of this is economic. Fake foods are more affordable. It's enticing people to eat more because they think they're saving money when they're really just buying heart disease.
author: Jillian Michaels

quote: Greed is not a financial issue. It's a heart issue.
author: Andy Stanley

quote: In this financial year we will be spending at least $1.5 billion on foreign aid and we cannot be sure that this money will be properly spent, as corruption and mismanagement in many of the recipient countries are legend.
author: Pauline Hanson

quote: Life started getting good when I started making money.
author: Balthazar Getty

quote: Encouragement to others is something everyone can give. Somebody needs what you have to give. It may not be your money it may be your time. It may be your listening ear. It may be your arms to encourage. It may be your smile to uplift. Who knows?
author: Joel Osteen

quote: A good reputation is more valuable than money.
author: Publilius Syrus

quote: If you stop at general math, you're only going to make general math money.
author: Snoop Dogg

quote: A penny saved is a penny earned.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Private jets cost a lot of money.
author: Donald Trump

quote: It is not the style of clothes one wears, neither the kind of automobile one drives, nor the amount of money one has in the bank, that counts. These mean nothing. It is simply service that measures success.
author: George Washington Carver

quote: I've been living the American Dream for over 25 years - just being able to do what I do, be creative, and make money out of it. It's incredible.
author: Dr. Dre

quote: One day I said to my dad, 'Are you disappointed that I'm working a minimum-wage job and I didn't go to college?' I'll never forget his response. He said, 'It's not about how much money you make or what your job is, but it's more about your character. For that, I'm proud of you.'
author: Josh Dun

quote: There's something about a holiday that isn't all about how much money you spend.
author: Hilarie Burton

quote: To make an embarrassing admission, I like video games. That's what got me into software engineering when I was a kid. I wanted to make money so I could buy a better computer to play better video games - nothing like saving the world.
author: Elon Musk

quote: Every day we are paying more for energy than we should due to poor insulation, inefficient lights, appliances, and heating and cooling equipment - money we could save by investing in energy efficiency.
author: Bernie Sanders

quote: There is no monopoly on becoming a millionaire. If you're jealous of those with more money, don't just sit there and complain - do something to make more money yourself.
author: Gina Rinehart

quote: I never attempt to make money on the stock market. I buy on the assumption that they could close the market the next day and not reopen it for five years.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: I think the American Dream used to be achieving one's goals in your field of choice - and from that, all other things would follow. Now, I think the dream has morphed into the pursuit of money: Accumulate enough of it, and the rest will follow.
author: Buzz Aldrin

quote: You can't reverse fame. You can lose all the money, but you'll never lose people knowing you.
author: J. Cole

quote: Nothing except the mint can make money without advertising.
author: Thomas Babington Macaulay

quote: Good grooming is integral and impeccable style is a must. If you don't look the part, no one will want to give you time or money.
author: Daymond John

quote: Money is my military, each dollar a soldier. I never send my money into battle unprepared and undefended. I send it to conquer and take currency prisoner and bring it back to me.
author: Kevin O'Leary

quote: If you can actually count your money, then you're not a rich man.
author: J. Paul Getty

quote: Making money is a hobby that will complement any other hobbies you have, beautifully.
author: Scott Alexander

quote: If money help a man to do good to others, it is of some value; but if not, it is simply a mass of evil, and the sooner it is got rid of, the better.
author: Swami Vivekananda

quote: Recession is when a neighbor loses his job. Depression is when you lose yours.
author: Ronald Reagan

quote: Just take yourself back to September 2001. As that month went on, and as that autumn unrolled, everybody wanted to do something. How can I help? Do you want my blood? Do you want money for the victims? I was a captain in the Marine Corps. I knew what I could do. I was right there. I was ready. I saw it. I moved the rubble with my own hands.
author: Rob Riggle

quote: Labour was the first price, the original purchase - money that was paid for all things. It was not by gold or by silver, but by labour, that all wealth of the world was originally purchased.
author: Adam Smith

quote: My principles are more important than the money or my title.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Want of money and the distress of a thief can never be alleged as the cause of his thieving, for many honest people endure greater hardships with fortitude. We must therefore seek the cause elsewhere than in want of money, for that is the miser's passion, not the thief s.
author: William Blake

quote: America... just a nation of two hundred million used car salesmen with all the money we need to buy guns and no qualms about killing anybody else in the world who tries to make us uncomfortable.
author: Hunter S. Thompson

quote: We have an obligation and a responsibility to be investing in our students and our schools. We must make sure that people who have the grades, the desire and the will, but not the money, can still get the best education possible.
author: Barack Obama

quote: Too many people spend money they haven't earned to buy things they don't want to impress people they don't like.
author: Will Rogers

quote: The American Republic will endure until the day Congress discovers that it can bribe the public with the public's money.
author: Alexis de Tocqueville

quote: The writer must earn money in order to be able to live and to write, but he must by no means live and write for the purpose of making money.
author: Karl Marx

quote: Alimony is like buying hay for a dead horse.
author: Groucho Marx

quote: I'm not that lazy, but I don't need that much money. I lead a fairly simple life.
author: Karl Pilkington

quote: I have ways of making money that you know nothing of.
author: John D. Rockefeller

quote: I've been looking around, and I noticed something: how much you really need to be loved. Ambition isn't just a desperate quest for positions or money. It's just love - lots of love.
author: Janis Joplin

quote: When I was young I thought that money was the most important thing in life now that I am old I know that it is.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Athletes and musicians make astronomical amounts of money. People get paid $100 million to throw a baseball! Shouldn't we all take less and pass some of that money onto others? Think about firefighters, teachers and policemen. We should celebrate people that are intellectually smart and trying to make this world a better place.
author: Kid Rock

quote: No complaint... is more common than that of a scarcity of money.
author: Adam Smith

quote: Capital is money, capital is commodities. By virtue of it being value, it has acquired the occult ability to add value to itself. It brings forth living offspring, or, at the least, lays golden eggs.
author: Karl Marx

quote: Money is like an arm or leg - use it or lose it.
author: Henry Ford

quote: Wind to a sailor is what money is to life on shore.
author: Sterling Hayden

quote: My parents raised me and my six siblings with little money... but lots of love.
author: Hilda Solis

quote: When I get a little money I buy books and if any is left I buy food and clothes.
author: Desiderius Erasmus

quote: You've got to tell your money what to do or it will leave.
author: Dave Ramsey

quote: Money, like vodka, turns a person into an eccentric.
author: Anton Chekhov

quote: The key to making money is to stay invested.
author: Suze Orman

quote: A real gentleman, even if he loses everything he owns, must show no emotion. Money must be so far beneath a gentleman that it is hardly worth troubling about.
author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

quote: Don't let making a living prevent you from making a life.
author: John Wooden

quote: Time is money. Wasted time means wasted money means trouble.
author: Shirley Temple

quote: Words are the money of fools.
author: Thomas Hobbes

quote: Companies spend millions of dollars on firewalls, encryption, and secure access devices and it's money wasted because none of these measures address the weakest link in the security chain: the people who use, administer, operate and account for computer systems that contain protected information.
author: Kevin Mitnick

quote: Money, not morality, is the principle commerce of civilized nations.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: There's no such thing as a free lunch.
author: Milton Friedman

quote: A billion here, a billion there, and pretty soon you're talking about real money.
author: Everett Dirksen

quote: I have turned down a lot of money for things that would have made me feel cheesy.
author: Tom Petty

quote: It is not the employer who pays the wages. Employers only handle the money. It is the customer who pays the wages.
author: Henry Ford

quote: If we pollute the air, water and soil that keep us alive and well, and destroy the biodiversity that allows natural systems to function, no amount of money will save us.
author: David Suzuki

quote: Companies should not have a singular view of profitability. There needs to be a balance between commerce and social responsibility... The companies that are authentic about it will wind up as the companies that make more money.
author: Howard Schultz

quote: Money doesn't make people happy. People make people happy.
author: Steve Wynn

quote: Innovation has nothing to do with how many R & D dollars you have. When Apple came up with the Mac, IBM was spending at least 100 times more on R & D. It's not about money. It's about the people you have, how you're led, and how much you get it.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: In any investment, you expect to have fun and make money.
author: Michael Jordan

quote: I'm a little lavish I must admit. But I'm not really concerned with money. Being rich is not my goal, being wealthy is.
author: CeeLo Green

quote: Money doesn't buy elegance. You can take an inexpensive sheath, add a pretty scarf, gray shoes, and a wonderful bag, and it will always be elegant.
author: Carolina Herrera

quote: We can all be successful and make money, but when we die, that ends. But when you are significant is when you help other people be successful. That lasts many a lifetime.
author: Lou Holtz

quote: What is important for kids to learn is that no matter how much money they have, earn, win, or inherit, they need to know how to spend it, how to save it, and how to give it to others in need. This is what handling money is about, and this is why we give kids an allowance.
author: Barbara Coloroso

quote: It's hard to tell with these Internet startups if they're really interested in building companies or if they're just interested in the money. I can tell you, though: If they don't really want to build a company, they won't luck into it. That's because it's so hard that if you don't have a passion, you'll give up.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: You aren't wealthy until you have something money can't buy.
author: Garth Brooks

quote: International affairs is very much run like the mafia. The godfather does not accept disobedience, even from a small storekeeper who doesn't pay his protection money. You have to have obedience; otherwise, the idea can spread that you don't have to listen to the orders, and it can spread to important places.
author: Noam Chomsky

quote: I spent a lot of money on booze, birds and fast cars. The rest I just squandered.
author: George Best

quote: I'm not interested in making money. It's just that with my talent, I'm cursed with it.
author: Noel Gallagher

quote: Money doesn't make you happy. I now have $50 million but I was just as happy when I had $48 million.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: As one digs deeper into the national character of the Americans, one sees that they have sought the value of everything in this world only in the answer to this single question: how much money will it bring in?
author: Alexis de Tocqueville

quote: I grew up in a really small town with not a lot of money, and I liked singing, but it was just something that was a hobby.
author: Justin Bieber

quote: All riches have their origin in mind. Wealth is in ideas - not money.
author: Robert Collier

quote: I'm proud to pay taxes in the United States; the only thing is, I could be just as proud for half the money.
author: Arthur Godfrey

quote: The real key to making money in stocks is not to get scared out of them.
author: Peter Lynch

quote: Our public school system is our country's biggest and most inefficient monopoly, yet it keeps demanding more and more money.
author: Phyllis Schlafly

quote: In economics, one of the most important concepts is 'opportunity cost' - the idea that once you spend your money on something, you can't spend it again on something else.
author: Malcolm Turnbull

quote: I don't mind that I'm fat. You still get the same money.
author: Marlon Brando

quote: Labor was the first price, the original purchase - money that was paid for all things.
author: Adam Smith

quote: If there's three boxes that say 'Single', 'In a Relationship,' and the third one says 'Getting Money', I'd check the third one.
author: Bryson Tiller

quote: I don't pay good wages because I have a lot of money I have a lot of money because I pay good wages.
author: Robert Bosch

quote: My philosophy has always been, 'do what you love and the money will follow.'
author: Amy Weber

quote: Find something in life that you love doing. If you make a lot of money, that's a bonus, and if you don't, you still won't hate going to work.
author: Jeff Foxworthy

quote: Boxing is the only sport you can get your brain shook, your money took and your name in the undertaker book.
author: Joe Frazier

quote: I don't care half so much about making money as I do about making my point, and coming out ahead.
author: Cornelius Vanderbilt

quote: People say money ain't nothing money is basically everything.
author: Meek Mill

quote: The highest use of capital is not to make more money, but to make money do more for the betterment of life.
author: Henry Ford

quote: Disasters happen. We still have no way to eliminate earthquakes, wildfires, hurricanes, floods or droughts. We cope as best we can by fortifying ourselves against danger with building codes and levees, and by setting aside money to clean up afterwards.
author: Seth Shostak

quote: A man in debt is so far a slave.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: I've got all the money I'll ever need, if I die by four o'clock.
author: Henny Youngman

quote: Money will determine whether the accused goes to prison or walks out of the courtroom a free man.
author: Johnnie Cochran

quote: I always thought money was something just to make me happy. But I've learned that I feel better being able to help my folks, 'cause we never had nothing. So just to see them excited about my career is more of a blessing than me actually having it for myself.
author: Kendrick Lamar

quote: At its core, bitcoin is a smart currency designed by very forward-thinking engineers. It eliminates the need for banks, gets rid of credit card fees, currency exchange fees, money transfer fees, and reduces the need for lawyers in transitions... all good things.
author: Peter Diamandis

quote: My job is making money, helping other people make money. I am spending money, trying to make sure more people get rich, because you cannot spend a lot of money, right? So my job is spending money, helping others. This is a headache.
author: Jack Ma

quote: I find money some way or other goes very fast. But I think I can reflect it has been spent with satisfaction and to my own honour.
author: John Hancock

quote: I can make more generals, but horses cost money.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: My integrity means more to me than any fame or money. When I say something, I want people to take it to the bank that I mean it and believe in it.
author: Tim Tebow

quote: I can't imagine being a single parent or a single parent that doesn't have a lot of money. That's a big, huge impact on your life and your dynamic and everything - I mean, that's huge. It affects how much you have a break from just concentrating on just one other person in your life. It becomes so myopic that way, and more intense, probably.
author: Joan Cusack

quote: Real riches are the riches possessed inside.
author: B. C. Forbes

quote: Ben Franklin may have discovered electricity- but it is the man who invented the meter who made the money.
author: Earl Warren

quote: Most men love money and security more, and creation and construction less, as they get older.
author: John Maynard Keynes

quote: There is a gigantic difference between earning a great deal of money and being rich.
author: Marlene Dietrich

quote: Never confuse the size of your paycheck with the size of your talent.
author: Marlon Brando

quote: Fortune is like glass - the brighter the glitter, the more easily broken.
author: Publilius Syrus

quote: If saving money is wrong, I don't want to be right!
author: William Shatner

quote: Money cannot buy peace of mind. It cannot heal ruptured relationships, or build meaning into a life that has none.
author: Richard M. DeVos

quote: If you want to reap financial blessings, you have to sow financially.
author: Joel Osteen

quote: There are two things people want more than sex and money... recognition and praise.
author: Mary Kay Ash

quote: Of my old tendency to overdo the dedication and deface the title page with florid compliments and obscure quotes which the recipient cannot read, I will say only that I learnt my lesson when I had to shell out with my own money for a hardback I'd vandalised and now limit myself to 'Good wishes.'
author: Howard Jacobson

quote: You can spend the money on new housing for poor people and the homeless, or you can spend it on a football stadium or a golf course.
author: Jello Biafra

quote: Of the billionaires I have known, money just brings out the basic traits in them. If they were jerks before they had money, they are simply jerks with a billion dollars.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: Raising the minimum wage to $10.10 will benefit about 28 million workers across the country. And it will help businesses, too - raising the wage will put more money in people's pockets, which they will pump back into the economy by spending it on goods and services in their communities.
author: Thomas Perez

quote: You don't appreciate a lot of stuff in school until you get older. Little things like being spanked every day by a middle-aged woman: Stuff you pay good money for in later life.
author: Emo Philips

quote: There is no class so pitiably wretched as that which possesses money and nothing else.
author: Andrew Carnegie

quote: People assume I'm out there having this great life, but money doesn't erase the pain. When you're young you barrel through life, making choices without thinking of repercussions. A few years down the line, you wake up in a certain place and wonder how the hell you got there.
author: Jennifer Lopez

quote: It's better to waste money, than it is to waste time. You can always get more money.
author: Hal Sparks

quote: I was a common man, and I will always remain a common man. No amount of stardom will ever consume my soul. Money comes, money goes. Fame comes, fame goes. I believe every human being is a celebrity in their own right.
author: A. R. Rahman

quote: One might think that the money value of an invention constitutes its reward to the man who loves his work. But... I continue to find my greatest pleasure, and so my reward, in the work that precedes what the world calls success.
author: Thomas A. Edison

quote: You can be young without money but you can't be old without it.
author: Tennessee Williams

quote: Money without brains is always dangerous.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: You never suffer from a money problem, you always suffer from an idea problem.
author: Robert H. Schuller

quote: If you would know the value of money, go and try to borrow some.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: You cannot spend money in luxury without doing good to the poor. Nay, you do more good to them by spending it in luxury, than by giving it; for by spending it in luxury, you make them exert industry, whereas by giving it, you keep them idle.
author: Samuel Johnson

quote: We did not get any money from the early records. It was all taken by crooked managers. It is just a gangster's paradise.
author: Robert Wyatt

quote: The nice thing about the gallery shows is that without having to pay any money you can just go and see it.
author: Yoko Ono

quote: The civility which money will purchase, is rarely extended to those who have none.
author: Charles Dickens

quote: The American people know the economy is too weak. Too many of them are suffering. So the question for Washington is, are we going to continue to play political games and - and - or are we going to say, we can do something right now to create jobs, to put money in the pockets of the middle-class, hire construction workers, teachers, veterans?
author: David Plouffe

quote: To me, natural, healthy looking skin is really beautiful. With a little concealer, eyeshadow, liner, gloss and bronzer, I love my lighter makeup look. I've saved so much money on facials!
author: Giuliana Rancic

quote: I hate wasting time or money and that happens all the time for no good reason, and then people save money by skimping on the important things.
author: Rick Baker

quote: I want to go to - what's that hot country with a lot of money? - Dubai.
author: Grandmaster Flash

quote: You gotta remember: we're musicians... we're just crazy people who can't get along sometimes. I've definitely come to the table with my knife in my pocket a couple of times you know how it is. It's part of being human. Now add fame and money and all that rock and roll craziness to it - we're lucky we don't eat each other in this industry!
author: Corey Taylor

quote: I think it's too bad that everybody's decided to turn on drugs, I don't think drugs are the problem. Crime is the problem. Cops are the problem. Money's the problem. But drugs are just drugs.
author: Jerry Garcia

quote: The 9/11 attack itself played out around the world, with planning meetings in Malaysia, operatives taking flight lessons in the United States, coordination by plot leaders based in Hamburg, and money transfers from Dubai - activities overseen by al-Qaeda's senior command from secure bases in Afghanistan.
author: Peter Bergen

quote: I wasn't a hacker for the money, and it wasn't to cause damage.
author: Kevin Mitnick

quote: I know exactly what my values are and what I love to do. That's worth additional years right there. I say no to a lot of stuff that would be easy money but deviates from my meaning of life.
author: Dan Buettner

quote: Who gets the risks? The risks are given to the consumer, the unsuspecting consumer and the poor work force. And who gets the benefits? The benefits are only for the corporations, for the money makers.
author: Cesar Chavez

quote: You use your money to buy privacy because during most of your life you aren't allowed to be normal.
author: Johnny Depp

quote: Profit is sweet, even if it comes from deception.
author: Sophocles

quote: A bank is a place that will lend you money if you can prove that you don't need it.
author: Bob Hope

quote: The importance of money flows from it being a link between the present and the future.
author: John Maynard Keynes

quote: You have reached the pinnacle of success as soon as you become uninterested in money, compliments, or publicity.
author: Thomas Wolfe

quote: In the beginning I just wanted to survive. For the first three years, we made zero revenue. I remember many times when I was trying to pay up, the restaurant owner would say, 'Your bill was paid.' And there would be a note saying, 'Mr. Ma, I'm your customer on the Alibaba platform. I made a lot of money, and I know you don't, so I paid the bill.'
author: Jack Ma

quote: Money demands that you sell, not your weakness to men's stupidity, but your talent to their reason.
author: Ayn Rand

quote: It's not about how skinny you are or how much money or how many diamonds you have - that's the fluff that people sometimes look at as being the main thing. It's about understanding that the things that make you fabulous are all inside of you.
author: Kimora Lee Simmons

quote: It doesn't take money to turn off the television and cultivate real bonding time.
author: Marianne Williamson

quote: Cast away care, he that loves sorrow Lengthens not a day, nor can buy tomorrow; Money is trash, and he that will spend it, Let him drink merrily, fortune will send it.
author: Thomas Dekker

quote: And that's why I wrote the book, because our country really needs to understand, if people in this nation understood what our foreign policy is really about, what foreign aid is about, how our corporations work, where our tax money goes, I know we will demand change.
author: John Perkins

quote: I have no one to leave the money to. I'm a single man. I like spending my money.
author: Elton John

quote: If time is money, it seems moral to save time, above all one's own, and such parsimony is excused by consideration for others. One is straight-forward.
author: Theodor Adorno

quote: I went to the bank and proposed that they lend money to the poor people. The bankers almost fell over.
author: Muhammad Yunus

quote: The shortest period of time lies between the minute you put some money away for a rainy day and the unexpected arrival of rain.
author: Jane Bryant Quinn

quote: A woman's best protection is a little money of her own.
author: Clare Boothe Luce

quote: Money often costs too much.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Many people take no care of their money till they come nearly to the end of it, and others do just the same with their time.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: Sudden money is going from zero to two hundred dollars a week. The rest doesn't count.
author: Neil Simon

quote: All money means to me is a pride in accomplishment.
author: Ray Kroc

quote: That money talks, I'll not deny, I heard it once: It said, 'Goodbye'.
author: Richard Armour

quote: Money makes your life easier. If you're lucky to have it, you're lucky.
author: Robert De Niro

quote: A fool and his money are soon parted.
author: Thomas Tusser

quote: No one's ever achieved financial fitness with a January resolution that's abandoned by February.
author: Suze Orman

quote: Poverty breeds lack of self-reliance.
author: Daniel De Leon

quote: There is no such thing as a good tax.
author: Unknown

quote: I think television's become a downright dangerous thing. It has no moral barometer whatsoever. If you want to talk about something that is all about money, just watch the television.
author: Tom Petty

quote: Money has to serve, not to rule.
author: Pope Francis

quote: I'd asked around 10 or 15 people for suggestions. Finally one lady friend asked the right question, 'Well, what do you love most?' That's how I started painting money.
author: Andy Warhol

quote: I wanted to be a pharmacist. I liked the way our local pharmacist was always dressed in a nice white coat; he looked very calm, you'd give him money, and he'd give you something that you wanted to buy.
author: Walter Matthau

quote: When we talk about the kind of folks whose lives will be made better by raising the minimum wage, we're not talking about a couple teenagers earning extra spending money to supplement their allowance. We're talking about providers and breadwinners. Working Americans with bills to pay and mouths to feed.
author: Thomas Perez

quote: Money isn't the most important thing in life, but it's reasonably close to oxygen on the 'gotta have it' scale.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: You loan your friend money. You see them again, they don't say nothin' 'bout the money. 'Hi, how ya doin'? How's ya mama doing?' Man, how's my money doin'?
author: Chris Tucker

quote: Don't matter how much money you got, there's only two kinds of people: there's saved people and there's lost people.
author: Bob Dylan

quote: Half the money I spend on advertising is wasted; the trouble is, I don't know which half.
author: John Wanamaker

quote: People who get trapped in the tunnel vision of making money think that is all there is to life.
author: Felix Dennis

quote: Young children need to develop good habits that will be useful to them the rest of their lives. It is important to keep the lessons age-appropriate. For example, when your children start earning allowances, that would be a good time to teach them how to put some money in the bank instead of spending it all.
author: Bill Rancic

quote: Flattery is a kind of bad money, to which our vanity gives us currency.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: There are some things that you can fulfil with money, but at the end of the day these are not the things that make you happy. It is the small things that make life good.
author: Sebastian Vettel

quote: If I had been on 'Bowling for Dollars', I'd wind up owing them money.
author: Ricki Lake

quote: Indians mock their corrupt politicians relentlessly, but they regard their honest politicians with silent suspicion. The first thing they do when they hear of a supposedly 'clean' politician is to grin. It is a cliche that honest politicians in India tend to have dishonest sons, who collect money from people seeking an audience with Dad.
author: Aravind Adiga

quote: Money never stays with me. It would burn me if it did. I throw it out of my hands as soon as possible, lest it should find its way into my heart.
author: John Wesley

quote: Don't build a glass house if you're worried about saving money on heating.
author: Philip Johnson

quote: You want to buy cars and houses and castles, all of that's on you and how America has systematized your mind to be into materialism. Hip-hop ain't got nothing to do with that. I'm glad that anybody making money has picked themselves up - I just want them to give some of it back to the community.
author: Afrika Bambaataa

quote: I spend my money on holidays and eating out, and it allows me to be generous.
author: James Nesbitt

quote: I believe God wants you to have money to pay your bills, send your kids to college and do charity work and build orphanages. There's the teaching that we're supposed to be poor to show that we're humble. I don't buy that. I think we're supposed to be leaders. We're supposed to excel.
author: Joel Osteen

quote: My parents survived the Great Depression and brought me up to live within my means, save some for tomorrow, share and don't be greedy, work hard for the necessities in life knowing that money does not make you better or more important than anyone else. So, extravagance has been bred out of my DNA.
author: David Suzuki

quote: Many novice real estate investors soon quit the profession and invest in a well-diversified portfolio of bonds. That's because, when you invest in real estate, you often see a side of humanity that stocks, bonds, mutual funds, and saving money shelter you from.
author: Robert Kiyosaki

quote: Back in the 1970s, Kodak tried to give $25m to a black civil rights organisation in Rochester, New York. The company's shareholders rose up in arms: making this politically charged offering wasn't the reason they had entrusted Kodak with their money. The donation was withdrawn.
author: Noreena Hertz

quote: I know you don't always need to spend a ton of money to be stylish.
author: Mark Indelicato

quote: When men do not have healthy notions of the Divinity, false ideas supplant them, just as in bad times one uses counterfeit money when there is no good money.
author: Voltaire

quote: I grew up in an era of pretty severe poverty. My parents weathered the Great Depression, and money was always a very big concern. I was weaned on a shortage mentality and placed in foster homes largely because there simply wasn't enough money to take care of the most basic of needs.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: We live in a digital world where all is available at the touch of a screen. Money has been simplified, changed subtly over time from tangible bills to numbers in cyberspace. Cash is no longer in a cloth bag; it's numbers on a screen. Numbers that can be manipulated and modified. If you run out of numbers, you can just buy some more, right?
author: Rhys Darby

quote: There's a time in everyone's career where you go, 'Ah, this is hard - how long am I going to have to do this?' But the rewards are so great. Who gets to go on the podium and hear the national anthem? The whole nation singing! Money can't buy you that.
author: Mo Farah

quote: One of the big myths about philanthropy is that it's all about donating funds for a cause. I like to look at it quite differently. Philanthropy is about 'giving' - not just in monetary terms but also in non-monetary aspects, like time, ideas, or being a volunteer. Donating money is just a small part of philanthropy.
author: Pankaj Patel

quote: Money doesn't talk, it swears.
author: Bob Dylan

quote: What does it mean when people applaud? Should I give 'em money? Say thank you? Lift my dress? The lack of applause - that I can respond to.
author: Barbra Streisand

quote: Money, it turned out, was exactly like sex, you thought of nothing else if you didn't have it and thought of other things if you did.
author: James A. Baldwin

quote: If all the rich and all of the church people should send their children to the public schools they would feel bound to concentrate their money on improving these schools until they met the highest ideals.
author: Susan B. Anthony

quote: I know of nothing more despicable and pathetic than a man who devotes all the hours of the waking day to the making of money for money's sake.
author: John D. Rockefeller

quote: To have done anything just for money is to have been truly idle.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Successful people make money. It's not that people who make money become successful, but that successful people attract money. They bring success to what they do.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: Speculation is only a word covering the making of money out of the manipulation of prices, instead of supplying goods and services.
author: Henry Ford

quote: I could have closed down bits of British Home Stores to make more money but it's not my style. I want to make my money as a retailer, not by putting people out of work.
author: Philip Green

quote: Ridiculous yachts and private planes and big limousines won't make people enjoy life more, and it sends out terrible messages to the people who work for them. It would be so much better if that money was spent in Africa - and it's about getting a balance.
author: Richard Branson

quote: I never lost money by turning a profit.
author: Bernard Baruch

quote: I try to do the right thing with money. Save a dollar here and there, clip some coupons. Buy ten gold chains instead of 20. Four summer homes instead of eight.
author: LL Cool J

quote: I actually thought that it would be a little confusing during the same period of your life to be in one meeting when you're trying to make money, and then go to another meeting where you're giving it away. I mean is it gonna erode your ability, you know, to make money? Are you gonna somehow get confused about what you're trying to do?
author: Bill Gates

quote: Money coming in says I've made the right marketing decisions.
author: Adam Osborne

quote: The press don't like to say nice things because nice is boring. It's much better to label me the devil. What we do is not brain surgery. We are entertainers, plain and simple, and we're responsible to bring that money back, to make a profit.
author: Michael Bay

quote: You get quick money, it's beautiful, there's sunshine, but at the end of the day, you find out it's all a masquerade, baby. It's not what it seems.
author: Wyclef Jean

quote: If it wasn't for the fun and money, I really don't know why I'd bother.
author: Terry Pratchett

quote: A lot of poets too live on the margins of social acceptance, they certainly aren't in it for the money. William Blake - only his first book was legitimately published.
author: Jim Jarmusch

quote: What white man can say I never stole his land or a penny of his money? Yet they say that I am a thief.
author: Sitting Bull

quote: I don't want to be married to someone who feels inferior to my success or because I make more money than he does.
author: Grace Kelly

quote: I made enough money to buy a house. That's crazy, but fame proved ephemeral.
author: Moon Unit Zappa

quote: Our idea is to serve everybody, including people with little money.
author: Ingvar Kamprad

quote: I'm a businesswoman who's serious about her money. I want an empire.
author: Toni Braxton

quote: When you first get money, you buy all these things so no one thinks you're mean, and you spread it around. You get a chauffeur and you find yourself thrown around the back of this car and you think, I was happier when I had my own little car! I could drive myself!
author: Paul McCartney

quote: The people of this country, not special interest big money, should be the source of all political power.
author: Paul Wellstone

quote: Everybody likes a kidder, but nobody lends him money.
author: Arthur Miller

quote: He who controls the money supply of a nation controls the nation.
author: James A. Garfield

quote: Taxation is just a sophisticated way of demanding money with menaces.
author: Terry Pratchett

quote: Time is money, especially when you are talking to a lawyer or buying a commercial.
author: Frank Dane

quote: We do not have a money problem in America. We have a values and priorities problem.
author: Marian Wright Edelman

quote: Benjamin Franklin may have discovered electricity, but it was the man who invented the meter who made the money.
author: Earl Wilson

quote: France is a place where the money falls apart in your hands but you can't tear the toilet paper.
author: Billy Wilder

quote: Money couldn't buy friends, but you got a better class of enemy.
author: Spike Milligan

quote: Liberals, it has been said, are generous with other peoples' money, except when it comes to questions of national survival when they prefer to be generous with other people's freedom and security.
author: William F. Buckley, Jr.

quote: You're right on the money with that. We're all like detectives in life. There's something at the end of the trail that we're all looking for.
author: David Lynch

quote: If you don't give your kid freedom to make choices with money, including stupid choices, he'll make plenty when he gets to college.
author: John W. Gardner

quote: I spent three days a week for 10 years educating myself in the public library, and it's better than college. People should educate themselves - you can get a complete education for no money. At the end of 10 years, I had read every book in the library and I'd written a thousand stories.
author: Ray Bradbury

quote: The system that enables the most people to earn the most success is free enterprise, by matching up people's skills, interests, and abilities. In contrast, redistribution simply spreads money around. Even worse, it attenuates the ability to earn success by perverting economic incentives.
author: Arthur C. Brooks

quote: I mean, I do think at a certain point you've made enough money.
author: Barack Obama

quote: Don't forget, I'm 39. I didn't come here just for the money to impress myself. I'm not saying I am going to be dominating. I'm not saying I'm going to be good. But I can promise you I will do all the right things to play.
author: Jaromir Jagr

quote: It's tough in the NHL you have to produce on a high level. And everybody expects you to do it because you make a lot of money. And I never minded it. I always want to be that guy.
author: Jaromir Jagr

quote: I always have said that the most valuable thing I have isn't money it's my time.
author: Chris Paul

quote: Money is speech. It's incongruous to say a multimillionaire can spend as much on his own campaign as he wants, but you can only give $2,300. His free speech rights are different from yours, thus violating the Equal Protection Clause of the Constitution. It's absurd.
author: Roger Stone

quote: Too many people measure how successful they are by how much money they make or the people that they associate with. In my opinion, true success should be measured by how happy you are.
author: Richard Branson

quote: The new American dream is one of responsibility. What is the bottom-line number that you're going to be able to pay back toward a student loan responsibly if you're doing it yourself after you have a job? That dictates the amount of money you can borrow. That dictates the school you can go to, if you can even go to a four-year college at all.
author: Suze Orman

quote: As kids we didn't complain about being poor; we talked about how rich we were going to be and made moves to get the lifestyle we aspired to by any means we could. And as soon as we had a little money, we were eager to show it.
author: Jay-Z

quote: Maturity: Be able to stick with a job until it is finished. Be able to bear an injustice without having to get even. Be able to carry money without spending it. Do your duty without being supervised.
author: Ann Landers

quote: Money and fame made me believe I was entitled. I was wrong and foolish.
author: Tiger Woods

quote: Do what you love and the money will follow.
author: Marsha Sinetar
tags: Love, Do What You Love, You

quote: I call Alibaba '1,001 mistakes.' We expanded too fast, and then in the dot-com bubble, we had to have layoffs. By 2002, we had only enough cash to survive for 18 months. We had a lot of free members using our site, and we didn't know how we'd make money. So we developed a product for China exporters to meet U.S. buyers online. This model saved us.
author: Jack Ma

quote: Money is the root of all evil, and yet it is such a useful root that we cannot get on without it any more than we can without potatoes.
author: Louisa May Alcott

quote: Men make counterfeit money; in many more cases, money makes counterfeit men.
author: Sydney J. Harris

quote: If you're going to be at a job environment, you should love it. You shouldn't do it just for money. You should do it because you love it. And the money comes naturally.
author: Debbi Fields

quote: He that is of the opinion money will do everything may well be suspected of doing everything for money.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: The studios don't seem to foster good writing. They're not so interested in that, but they're more interested in what worked most recently. They're definitely very serious about making money, and that's not a wrong thing, but you don't have to make money the same way all the time.
author: Bill Murray

quote: I think that stocks have been this tremendous, tremendous equalizer for people in this country. Guys who can't make a lot of money at their jobs have been able to make a lot of money in the stock market.
author: Jim Cramer

quote: The only football players in my time were fellows who really loved to play football. They were not in it for the money. There wasn't much money there. They would have played football for nothing.
author: Red Grange

quote: I don't care about having money. It's about being happy, man.
author: Skrillex

quote: Research is four things: brains with which to think, eyes with which to see, machines with which to measure and, fourth, money.
author: Albert Szent-Gyorgyi

quote: I need nothing from my companion. No money, no financial security, no emotional support, nothing. All I want is the freedom to be myself.
author: Kangana Ranaut

quote: I want to make as much money as I possibly can so that when my day comes, my mother and sister is fine. My close friends are fine. They don't have to worry about anything ever again.
author: Tyler, The Creator

quote: No one would remember the Good Samaritan if he'd only had good intentions he had money as well.
author: Margaret Thatcher

quote: Profit or perish... There are only two ways to make money: increase sales and decrease costs.
author: Fred DeLuca

quote: Pretty much, Apple and Dell are the only ones in this industry making money. They make it by being Wal-Mart. We make it by innovation.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Yes, money is important. But it's all about the creative process.
author: Travis Scott

quote: You pay more in wages, get more in in tax, you get people living a higher standard, you get more money. It's a kind of circle.
author: Jeremy Corbyn

quote: When we talk about having a life of significance and meaning, it's not about fame or money or resources. It's about people and lives and hearts. That's my biggest passion in life.
author: Tim Tebow

quote: The money's the same, whether you earn it or scam it.
author: Bobby Heenan

quote: We learned many years ago that the rich may have money, but the poor have time.
author: Cesar Chavez

quote: I would never wear a look that was all the same designer. I always wear at least one thing that is vintage. I dress according to my mood, and I usually spend money on the basics, like leather jackets, handbags, sweaters and shoes.
author: Elsa Hosk

quote: People spend time worrying about things they think they have to have and lose perception of what they do have. You can have all the money and material things you want. If you aren't here to enjoy them, what good do they do?
author: Eric Davis

quote: Most of Hollywood is about making money - and I love money, but I don't make the films thinking about money.
author: David Lynch

quote: In school, my favorite subject was math. That's where I learned to count money.
author: French Montana

quote: Cricketers have a very short shelf life. On an average, you make money through cricket for five years, but you need to survive for sixty years.
author: Mahendra Singh Dhoni

quote: If our soldiers are not overburdened with money, it is not because they have a distaste for riches; if their lives are not unduly long, it is not because they are disinclined to longevity.
author: Sun Tzu

quote: Why are people unemployed? Because there is no work. Why is there no work? Because people are not buying products and services. Why are people not buying products and services? Because they have no money. Why do people have no money? Because they are unemployed.
author: Craig Bruce

quote: I definitely wanted to earn my freedom. But the primary motivation wasn't making money, but making an impact.
author: Sean Parker

quote: Money is just the poor man's credit card.
author: Marshall McLuhan

quote: So you think that money is the root of all evil. Have you ever asked what is the root of all money?
author: Ayn Rand

quote: Neither a borrower nor a lender be.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: The safe way to double your money is to fold it over once and put it in your pocket.
author: Kin Hubbard

quote: Pennies do not come from heaven. They have to be earned here on earth.
author: Margaret Thatcher

quote: The man who won't loan money isn't going to have many friends - or need them.
author: Wilt Chamberlain

quote: Run for your life from any man who tells you that money is evil. That sentence is the leper's bell of an approaching looter.
author: Ayn Rand

quote: We have the right as individuals to give away as much of our own money as we please in charity but as members of Congress we have no right to appropriate a dollar of the public money.
author: Davy Crockett

quote: Criminals are never very amusing. It's because they're failures. Those who make real money aren't counted as criminals. This is a class distinction, not an ethical problem.
author: Orson Welles

quote: My pride fell with my fortunes.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Friends and acquaintances are the surest passport to fortune.
author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quote: I have no money, no resources, no hopes. I am the happiest man alive.
author: Henry Miller

quote: I'm hopeless with money I simply spend what I've got.
author: Freddie Mercury

quote: I had some money, I made the best paintings ever. I was completely reclusive, worked a lot, took a lot of drugs. I was awful to people.
author: Jean-Michel Basquiat

quote: We've got to put a lot of money into changing behavior.
author: Bill Gates

quote: It is not the creation of wealth that is wrong, but the love of money for its own sake.
author: Margaret Thatcher

quote: Money does not make you happy but it quiets the nerves.
author: Sean O'Casey

quote: A man is usually more careful of his money than of his principles.
author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Jr.

quote: But men are so full of greed today, they'll sell anything for a little piece of money.
author: Little Richard

quote: Fame is addictive. Money is addictive. Attention is addictive. But golf is second to none.
author: Marc Anthony

quote: The people who are buying stocks because they're going up and they don't know what they do deserve to lose money.
author: Jim Cramer

quote: Because its hard to realize now that that was the end of the great depression, you know. All of a sudden all of this is in front of me and I'm solvent, you know. I'm making some money and I know where my next meal is coming from, and I have a new pair of shoes and that's it.
author: Robert McCloskey

quote: My NFL pension can barely pay my son's tuition. You know, it's very little money.
author: O. J. Simpson

quote: I did my time for the rape. I paid my money to Las Vegas. I paid my dues.
author: Mike Tyson

quote: While money doesn't buy love, it puts you in a great bargaining position.
author: Christopher Marlowe

quote: There's something so romantic about being broke in New York. You gotta do it. You have to live there once without any money, and then you have to live there when you have money. Let me tell you, of the two, the latter is far better.
author: Amy Poehler

quote: I spent more money on one robe than guys spend in five years.
author: Ric Flair

quote: Money is worth nothing if it can't buy you the opportunity to love more.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: On privacy issues, it's just like hundreds of years ago when people said, 'I would rather put my money under my pillow than in a bank.' But today, banks know how to protect money much better than you do. Today, we may not have the answers to privacy issues, but I believe our young people will come up with the solutions.
author: Jack Ma

quote: Money is the string with which a sardonic destiny directs the motions of its puppets.
author: W. Somerset Maugham

quote: We all need money, but there are degrees of desperation.
author: Anthony Burgess

quote: There are necessary evils. Money is an important thing in terms of representing freedom in our world. And now I have a daughter to think about. It's really the first time I've thought about the future and what it could be.
author: Johnny Depp

quote: Charter schools are public schools that operate, to a certain extent, outside the system. They have more control over their teachers, curriculum and resources. They also have less money than public schools.
author: Maggie Gallagher

quote: Money takes wings. The only thing that endures is character.
author: O. J. Simpson

quote: But if you want to continue to be slaves of the banks and pay the cost of your own slavery, then let bankers continue to create money and control credit.
author: Josiah Stamp

quote: Money can't buy poverty.
author: Marty Feldman

quote: It will be a great day when our schools have all the money they need, and our air force has to have a bake-sale to buy a bomber.
author: Robert Fulghum

quote: A savvy entrepreneur will not always look for investment money, first.
author: Daymond John

quote: People may take a job for more money, but they often leave it for more recognition.
author: Bob Nelson

quote: When men have money and power they get turned on, sexually. They get horny as hell. Can't imagine why, though.
author: Penelope Spheeris

quote: And I think the more money you put in people's hands, the more they will spend. And if they don't spend it, they invest it. And investing it is another way of creating jobs. It puts money into mutual funds or other kinds of banks that can go out and make loans, and we need to do that.
author: Michael Bloomberg

quote: If we command our wealth, we shall be rich and free; if our wealth commands us, we are poor indeed.
author: Edmund Burke

quote: A man who gives his children habits of industry provides for them better than by giving them fortune.
author: Richard Whately

quote: We are not going to achieve a new world order without paying for it in blood as well as in words and money.
author: Arthur M. Schlesinger, Jr.

quote: If you can get some of the devil's money to use for the Lord's work, if you have to borrow it, it is all right and carry on the work.
author: John Harvey Kellogg

quote: I know why most people never get rich. They put the money ahead of the job. If you just think of the job, the money will automatically follow. This never fails.
author: Hedy Lamarr

quote: Bank failures are caused by depositors who don't deposit enough money to cover losses due to mismanagement.
author: Dan Quayle

quote: Always try to rub up against money, for if you rub up against money long enough, some of it may rub off on you.
author: Damon Runyon

quote: All the money I have, I got it legally.
author: Floyd Mayweather, Jr.

quote: I have a fantastic relationship with money. I use it to buy my freedom.
author: Gianni Versace

quote: When my father bid $5,000 for the 1962 Championship Game, that was a huge amount. It was double the bid the year before. Pete Rozelle was flabbergasted. Who was this guy who was willing to spend so much money on what seemed like relatively worthless rights to the NFL Championship Game?
author: Steve Sabol

quote: I always look at money not as a motivating factor but as an element in the composition. You can't ignore it, but you've got to be very careful that it's not motivating you.
author: Damien Hirst

quote: It's easy to love yourself when you feel good enough, when you feel special enough, when you're loved enough, when you have enough money, and you're appreciated.
author: Debbie Ford

quote: Most people are squeamish about saying how much they earn, but in medicine the situation seems especially fraught. Doctors aren't supposed to be in it for the money, and the more concerned a doctor seems to be about making money the more suspicious people become about the care being provided.
author: Atul Gawande

quote: The purpose of work is not to make money. The purpose of work is to make the workers, whether working stiffs or top executives, feel good about life.
author: Ricardo Semler

quote: I don't buy these rag magazines that feed off of stolen, you know, press. They're basically stealing someone's image in order to make money for themselves... They wait at the end of my street in their cars. Every time I exit my home, I have company.
author: Ashton Kutcher

quote: I don't think there is anything wrong in earning money from the sport you love. If you work hard and get benefits from it, there is no harm. The day you feel that you are not working hard and are only looking at the benefits, that's where the problem is.
author: Virat Kohli

quote: Not only do unemployment benefits help families who are hurting they also put money into their pockets that they'll then spend - and their spending will keep other Americans in jobs.
author: Robert Reich

quote: There is nothing wrong with making money, but that's not particularly inspiring.
author: John Mackey

quote: One should live between extravagance and meanness. Don't save money by starving your mind. It is false economy never to take a holiday, or never to spend money for an evening's amusement or for a useful book.
author: Orison Swett Marden

quote: I'm enjoying life at my fullest. Sometimes you realize that money isn't everything.
author: Rey Mysterio

quote: Money is like manure, of very little use except it be spread.
author: Francis Bacon

quote: It isn't enough for you to love money - it's also necessary that money should love you.
author: Kin Hubbard

quote: The process by which banks create money is so simple that the mind is repelled.
author: John Kenneth Galbraith

quote: I could have played another year, but I would have been playing for the money, and baseball deserves better than that.
author: George Brett

quote: I don't think the money people in Hollywood have ever thought I was normal, but I am dedicated to my work and that's what counts.
author: Angelina Jolie

quote: Three groups spend other people's money: children, thieves, politicians. All three need supervision.
author: Dick Armey

quote: Money is the seed of money, and the first guinea is sometimes more difficult to acquire than the second million.
author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

quote: Money is neither my god nor my devil. It is a form of energy that tends to make us more of who we already are, whether it's greedy or loving.
author: Dan Millman

quote: Money is in some respects life's fire: it is a very excellent servant, but a terrible master.
author: P. T. Barnum

quote: Look, you're here to see me, and I can't go on until my dealer is here, and he's waiting to be paid, so give me some money so I can fix up, and then you'll get your show.
author: Iggy Pop

quote: Don't give me any money, don't give me any people, but give freedom, and I'll give you a movie that looks gigantic.
author: Robert Rodriguez

quote: Money tends to make people suspicious, if there's any money floating around.
author: Mitchell Baker

quote: We have one of the highest interest rates in the world, and we owe more money per capita than any other country. All we need is a nail hole in the bottom of the boat and we're sunk.
author: Pauline Hanson

quote: Because A Walk To Remember had come out and it had made money and I got a lot of congratulations at that time as it happens out there.
author: Shane West

quote: I think the situation in Toronto is such that there are funding organizations which make it easy for a film to raise more money than it needs and very often that works against a film.
author: Atom Egoyan

quote: Our American friends offer us money, arms, and advice. We take the money, we take the arms, and we decline the advice.
author: Moshe Dayan

quote: What have I got? No looks, no money, no education. Just talent.
author: Sammy Davis, Jr.

quote: More than one-third of Mexicans in the United States own property in Mexico, nearly 80 percent send money home and 25 percent have a spouse in Mexico. Assimilation and becoming an American citizen are not the objective for many of them.
author: John Shadegg

quote: That is where the power, opportunity, and choice come from-when you have money. Money equals opportunity. There is no question.
author: Billie Jean King

quote: Love is cheap. You can buy it anywhere. Lives are cheap. It's money that's dear. You have to work days and sit up nights thinking how to make money.
author: John Dos Passos

quote: The extravagant expenditure of public money is an evil not to be measured by the value of that money to the people who are taxed for it.
author: Chester A. Arthur

quote: I've never chased money. It's always been about what I can do to motivate and inspire people.
author: Tyler Perry

quote: Other than my foundation - mentoring programs - everything I do is for money.
author: Steve Harvey

quote: When you're making an independent film what you don't have in time and money you have to make up with creativity and diligence.
author: Matthew Lillard

quote: I felt in a lot of instances I was deliberately being put through stress because when you're a guy who generates money, people have a vested interested in controlling you.
author: Dave Chappelle

quote: The 'American Idol' and 'X Factor' shows, they're great shows. But I think I need to make a show like that, directed straight to the hood, to the artists that don't get the attention, that don't have the money to make themselves representable.
author: Snoop Dogg

quote: I'm free of stress and worries now because if I don't like something I'm doing, I just find the fun in it instead of being miserable. Let me have fun with the people I work with, let me have fun making money - when I grew up so poor, ya know?
author: Jenny McCarthy

quote: Now workers should have the right to join unions. But unions should not be forced upon workers. And unions should not have the power to take money our of their members' paychecks to buy the support of politicians that are favored by the union bosses.
author: Mitt Romney

quote: If you got the money honey I got the time and when you run out of money honey I run out of time.
author: Willie Nelson

quote: My luck at the gambling table was varied; sometimes I was fifty to a hundred dollars ahead, and at other times I had to borrow money from my fellow workmen to settle my room rent and pay for my meals.
author: James Weldon Johnson

quote: I have too much money invested in sweaters.
author: Bob Hope

quote: I made more money yesterday than I ever thought I'd make in an entire lifetime. But it's like somebody's going to take it all away from me and I'll be back in Texas, installing them damned irrigation wells. I didn't like that when I was sixteen. And I know I wouldn't like it when I'm eighty.
author: Jimmy Dean

quote: What we need is more money back in the hands of Americans of any economic standing and so raising taxes right now doesn't make sense.
author: Kevin Yoder

quote: There was a time when a fool and his money were soon parted, but now it happens to everybody.
author: Adlai E. Stevenson

quote: You want 21 percent risk free? Pay off your credit cards.
author: Andrew Tobias

quote: Money is the barometer of a society's virtue.
author: Ayn Rand

quote: You have to go broke three times to learn how to make a living.
author: Casey Stengel

quote: Credit buying is much like being drunk. The buzz happens immediately and gives you a lift... The hangover comes the day after.
author: Joyce Brothers

quote: The thing that differentiates man from animals is money.
author: Gertrude Stein

quote: Money's a horrid thing to follow, but a charming thing to meet.
author: Henry James

quote: If you can count your money, you don't have a billion dollars.
author: J. Paul Getty

quote: No man's credit is as good as his money.
author: John Dewey

quote: Money will buy a pretty good dog, but it won't buy the wag of his tail.
author: Josh Billings

quote: Affluence creates poverty.
author: Marshall McLuhan

quote: It's morally wrong to allow a sucker to keep his money.
author: W. C. Fields

quote: For I can raise no money by vile means.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Wealth and want equally harden the human heart.
author: Theodore Parker

quote: There's just one thing I can't figure out. My income tax!
author: Nat King Cole

quote: A simple fact that is hard to learn is that the time to save money is when you have some.
author: Joe Moore

quote: I am happy to make money. I want to make more money, make more music, eat Big Macs and drink Budweisers.
author: Kid Rock

quote: Anybody who thinks money will make you happy, hasn't got money.
author: David Geffen

quote: Money equals freedom.
author: Kevin O'Leary

quote: The big difference between sex for money and sex for free is that sex for money usually costs a lot less.
author: Brendan Behan

quote: There's no money in poetry, but then there's no poetry in money, either.
author: Robert Graves

quote: Banks are an almost irresistible attraction for that element of our society which seeks unearned money.
author: J. Edgar Hoover

quote: A man is usually more careful of his money than he is of his principles.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: If advertisers spent the same amount of money on improving their products as they do on advertising then they wouldn't have to advertise them.
author: Will Rogers

quote: You can't pay enough money to... cure that feeling of being broken and confused.
author: Winona Ryder

quote: Neither soldiers nor money can defend a king but only friends won by good deeds, merit, and honesty.
author: Sallust

quote: If a man has money, it is usually a sign, too, that he knows how to take care of it; don't imagine his money is easy to get simply because he has plenty of it.
author: E. W. Howe

quote: You can have money piled to the ceiling but the size of your funeral is still going to depend on the weather.
author: Chuck Tanner

quote: I pity the French Cinema because it has no money. I pity the American Cinema because it has no ideas.
author: Jean-Luc Godard

quote: God is on everyone's side... and in the last analysis, he is on the side with plenty of money and large armies.
author: Jean Anouilh

quote: Nobody ever lost money taking a profit.
author: Bernard Baruch

quote: Gambling with cards or dice or stocks is all one thing. It's getting money without giving an equivalent for it.
author: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: We can safely abandon the doctrine of the eighties, namely that the rich were not working because they had too little money, the poor because they had much.
author: John Kenneth Galbraith

quote: There's only one thing money won't buy, and that is poverty.
author: Joe E. Lewis

quote: I really don't like talking about money. All I can say is that the Good Lord must have wanted me to have it.
author: Larry Bird

quote: The price we have to pay for money is sometimes liberty.
author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: Time will take your money, but money won't buy time.
author: James Taylor

quote: Money is not required to buy one necessity of the soul.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Get inside information from the president and you will probably lose half your money. If you get it from the chairman of the board, you will lose all of your money.
author: Jim Rogers

quote: I heard someone in opposition to reform last night criticize the president for saying it's their money. They said it's not their money it's my mother's money. Well that's what's wrong with the system.
author: Johnny Isakson

quote: I didn't think any amount of money was worth something that would take away what you believed in or what you stood for. I didn't want to do something my parents and daughter couldn't be proud of.
author: Tippi Hedren

quote: My ambition is to have beautiful encounters, not to make money.
author: Juliette Binoche

quote: I'd rather have happiness than money. People ask for it. Sometimes when I don't have it. I make other people's problems my problem because they want me to they ask me to.
author: Brenda Fassie

quote: I choose the likely man in preference to the rich man I want a man without money rather than money without a man.
author: Themistocles

quote: Money is only a vehicle that provides you with options, and I say there's only one thing that money can't buy - poverty.
author: Jerry Doyle

quote: What we get from this adventure is just sheer joy. And joy is, after all, the end of life. We do not live to eat and make money.
author: George Leigh Mallory

quote: There's no way in the world I can feel the same blues the way I used to. When I play in Chicago, I'm playing up-to-date, not the blues I was born with. People should hear the pure blues - the blues we used to have when we had no money.
author: Muddy Waters

quote: No race of barbarians ever existed yet offered up children for money.
author: Samuel Gompers

quote: I always ignore money.
author: Damien Hirst

quote: The reason there weren't any, I am surmising, is that a lot of Latin kids, Latino kids, in those days didn't have the money to take those kind of classes.
author: Rita Moreno

quote: I did a terrible television pilot that was so badly written and dumb that it became a turning point for me and I decided that I would never accept a job just because I needed the money.
author: Fran Drescher

quote: As a society we're always so quick and able to spend money on lawyers for someone for incarceration, but we don't make the corresponding commitment to the preventative components of it.
author: Matt Gonzalez

quote: We are now after 7 months operation making money here.
author: Henry Wells

quote: Now Congress learns that the Veterans Administration failed to provide complete, accurate information on the money it needs for both this year and next year.
author: Doc Hastings

quote: San Francisco is an interesting place. It's always been such a nice culturally diverse environment, which it still is, but there's a lot of money there now and a lot of dot com's so it's a little different than it used to be.
author: Les Claypool

quote: Money can add very much to one's ability to lead a constructive life, not only pleasant for oneself, but, hopefully, beneficial to others.
author: David Rockefeller

quote: When I was younger I was completely without money - when I was studying in Budapest, when I was a refugee.
author: Gyorgy Ligeti

quote: I really wish there was some big brother conspiracy theory. I just think it's the ignorance of trying to make a dollar. That's what the networks have done and will continue to do. If anyone doesn't think that this is about making money, then they're crazy.
author: Montel Williams

quote: American men, as a group, seem to be interested in only two things, money and breasts. It seems a very narrow outlook.
author: Hedy Lamarr

quote: The black groups that boycott certain films would do better to get the money together to make the films they want to see, or stay in church and leave us to our work.
author: Richard Pryor

quote: And, we have no such thing as a budget anymore. Our manager freaks when we show him the bill. We're lavish to the bone, but all our money goes back into the product.
author: Freddie Mercury

quote: Law students have taken over Hollywood. To them it's all about making money. They know people want to see what they've seen before. Also, remakes are places to showcase the new stars of tomorrow.
author: Tobe Hooper

quote: Fame was thrilling only until it became grueling. Money was fun only until you ran out of things to buy.
author: Gloria Swanson

quote: We are the nation the most powerful, the most armed and we are supplying arms and money to the rest of the world where we are not ourselves fighting. We are eating while there is famine in the world.
author: Dorothy Day

quote: Money is the great tool through whose means labor and skill become universally co-operative.
author: Leland Stanford

quote: We got more provisions for our whiskey than the same money, which we paid for the liquor, would have bought; so after all it proved a very profitable investment.
author: Buffalo Bill

quote: I had a great time on News Radio, I got to make tons of money in relative obscurity and learn a lot about the TV biz and work on my standup act constantly. It was a dream gig.
author: Joe Rogan

quote: The way I grew up, I was always taught that it's uncouth to talk about money, and that's not what should inspire you.
author: Justin Timberlake

quote: No matter how much money you have or what kind of cocoon you live in, the reality is that you have lost a game of football and let England's fans down. We are bothered.
author: Rio Ferdinand

quote: A little wanton money, which burned out the bottom of his purse.
author: Thomas More

quote: We talk about a free press. These people hide, they make a lot of money off the media. They hide behind the slogans of free press, and then they can come out with crap like that. It's just garbage. It's insulting to the readers.
author: Robert Scheer

quote: I have heartaches, I have blues. No matter what you got, the blues is there. 'Cause that's all I know - the blues. And I can sing the blues so deep until you can have this room full of money and I can give you the blues.
author: John Lee Hooker

quote: Happy is harder than money. Anybody who thinks money will make you happy hasn't got money.
author: David Geffen

quote: Because parents have power over children. They feel they have to do what their parents say. But the love of money is the root of all evil. And this is a sweet child. And to see him turn like this, this isn't him. This is not him.
author: Michael Jackson

quote: And my father didn't have money for me to go to college. And at that particular time they didn't have black quarterbacks, and I don't think I could have made it in basketball, because I was only 5' 11". So I just picked baseball.
author: Willie Mays

quote: I like to sing ballads the way Eddie Fisher does and the way Perry Como does. But the way I'm singing now is what makes the money.
author: Elvis Presley

quote: The rich man who gives, steals twice over. First he steals the money and then the hearts of men.
author: Edvard Munch

quote: Money may kindle, but it cannot by itself, and for very long, burn.
author: Igor Stravinsky

quote: I make a lot of money and I'm worth every cent.
author: Naomi Campbell

quote: I like my money right where I can see it... hanging in my closet.
author: Sarah Jessica Parker

quote: There's so little money in my bank account, my scenic checks show a ghetto.
author: Phyllis Diller

quote: Always remember, money isn't everything - but also remember to make a lot of it before talking such fool nonsense.
author: Earl Wilson

quote: But if inventions have increased man's power over nature very much, then the real value of money is better measured for some purposes in labour than in commodities.
author: Alfred Marshall

quote: Having money is rather like being a blond. It is more fun but not vital.
author: Mary Quant

quote: A fool and his money are lucky enough to get together in the first place.
author: Stanley Weiser

quote: Because people have no thoughts to deal in, they deal cards, and try and win one another's money. Idiots!
author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quote: When you're on a series, it's tough to go on and do something else afterward. If you're smart, save your money and you can wait out the bad times, until something else comes along.
author: Michael Dorn

quote: It is time for us to insist that we are accountable for the money that we are spending.
author: Eric Cantor

quote: You know, my main reaction to this money thing is that it's humorous, all the attention to it, because it's hardly the most insightful or valuable thing that's happened to me.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Money is a scoreboard where you can rank how you're doing against other people.
author: Mark Cuban
